column5: Hey looking at the satellite images it looks like the opener was iced-out until May23-ish. Any word when the first flights made it in? I normally fish the opener, well every other year, but skipped it this year because of my buddies health. Would be interested in hearing from anyone that's been up this year. Thanks, Kevin

I have been up since the 16th on Mattawa Bay - the ice didn't go out until the 21st - fishing is horrible in the main parts and we cant fish in the spawning areas till June 1st. they are just starting to spawn now - Should be good in 2 weeks or so.
